Class LongTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • LongTerm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LongTerm
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    CS2212 6_TheWeather LongTerm.java This class contains all parameters and methods required for a long term forecast. It consists of an array of Daily objects.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns the Daily object stored at the specified index of the longTerm array
        Parameters:

        Returns:
